1011001111110000 1001111000011100 1 -> sum: 0101001000001101, cout: 1
0101011111110000 1101100111110010 1 -> sum: 0011000111100011, cout: 1
1111110111001011 0100001100011110 0 -> sum: 0100000011101001, cout: 1
1111010010000111 0110001110100000 1 -> sum: 0101100000101000, cout: 1
0010001110100110 0101100100011011 0 -> sum: 0111110011000001, cout: 0
0010000001111100 1101011101110101 1 -> sum: 1111011111110010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
